Cougaar 12.7

Uses of Package
org.cougaar.core.service

Packages that use org.cougaar.core.service
org.cougaar.core.adaptivity This package contains the Cougaar adaptivity engine and client APIs. 
org.cougaar.core.agent This package contains the Cougaar agent base class and bootstrapping components. 
org.cougaar.core.agent.service.alarm   
org.cougaar.core.agent.service.community   
org.cougaar.core.agent.service.containment   
org.cougaar.core.agent.service.event   
org.cougaar.core.blackboard This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService. 
org.cougaar.core.domain This package contains the Cougaar DomainManager and LogicProvider interfaces. 
org.cougaar.core.logging   
org.cougaar.core.mobility.arch   
org.cougaar.core.mobility.plugin   
org.cougaar.core.mobility.service   
org.cougaar.core.mobility.servlet   
org.cougaar.core.mts.singlenode This package contains a single-node MTS implementation, created for performance characterization and MTS overhead computation. 
org.cougaar.core.node This package contains the Cougaar JVM node and node-level services. 
org.cougaar.core.persist This package contains the Cougaar persistence and rehydration support. 
org.cougaar.core.plugin This package contains the Cougaar ComponentPlugin "plugin" base class. 
org.cougaar.core.plugin.deletion   
org.cougaar.core.plugin.freeze   
org.cougaar.core.qos.ca Coordination Artifacts are designed to separate out an abstract communication pattern, on the one hand, and the domain-specific clients of the communication on the other. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.selectserver   
org.cougaar.core.qos.frame Overview: The Cougaar Frame infrastructure provides a lightweight and efficiently distributed form of knowledge representation supporting two independent inheritance hierarchies, path following, and code generation. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.frame.topology   
org.cougaar.core.qos.frame.visualizer   
org.cougaar.core.qos.metrics This package contains the Cougaar "Quality of Service" (QoS) support for runtime metrics. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.profile Utility components to periodically log performance metrics, such as the cpu load and message traffic. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.rss This package defines an implemenation of the metrics services that uses the ResourceStatusService (RSS) as its underlying infrastructure. 
org.cougaar.core.service This package contains the Cougaar primary core service APIs. 
org.cougaar.core.servlet   
org.cougaar.core.thread This package contains the Cougaar pooled ThreadService implementation. 
org.cougaar.core.wp This package contains the Cougaar "white pages" naming service. 
org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap   
org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.config   
org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.http   
org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.rmi   
org.cougaar.core.wp.resolver   
org.cougaar.core.wp.server   
org.cougaar.lib.web.engine   
org.cougaar.lib.web.micro.mts This package contains the Cougaar message-transport-based servlet engine and tunnel. 
org.cougaar.lib.web.redirect   
org.cougaar.mts.base This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.http This package contains the software components needed for the HTTP and HTTPS Link Protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.jms   
org.cougaar.mts.rmi This package contains the RMI and RMI-SSL link protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.std This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime. 
org.cougaar.planning.ldm   
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.lps   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.asset   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.completion   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.deletion   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.util   
org.cougaar.planning.service   
org.cougaar.planning.servlet   
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.service used by org.cougaar.core.adaptivity
BlackboardQueryService
          This service offers a lightweight query-only version of BlackboardService.
BlackboardService
          This service provides transactional publish/subscribe access to the local agent's blackboard.
ConditionService
          This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to look up sensor data on the blackboard.
LoggingService
          This Service provides a generic logging API.
OperatingModeService
          This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to find OperatingModes on the blackboard.
UIDService
          This service provides UIDs, which are globally unique object identifiers.

          This Service provides a generic logging API.

          This service provides a Schedulables to execute a Runnable.run() method within a pooled thread.

ThreadService
          This service provides a Schedulables to execute a Runnable.run() method within a pooled thread.

Classes in org.cougaar.core.service used by org.cougaar.core.node
AgentIdentificationService
          This service provides the local agent's MessageAddress.
AgentQuiescenceStateService
          This service allows a component to query the agents registered with the node's QuiescenceReportService and mark agents as dead (ignorable) when they have been restarted on another node.
LoggingService
          This Service provides a generic logging API.
NodeMetricsService
          This service provides simple node-level metrics.
SuicideService
          This service is used to tell the agent (or node) to exit, for example due to an OutOfMemoryError.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.service used by org.cougaar.core.persist
DataProtectionKey
          An interface used by the DataProtectionService.
DataProtectionKeyEnvelope
          Implementations of this interface contain a secret key used to encrypt/decrypt persisted data.
DataProtectionService
          This service is used by persistence to sign/encrypt an OutputStream and verify/decrypt an InputStream.
PersistenceControlService
          This service can be used to view and modify persistence settings.
PersistenceMetricsService
          This service provides metrics for recent persistence activity, such as the most recent snapshot size in bytes.
PersistenceMetricsService.Metric

          This service provides the local agent's MessageAddress.

          This service controls the execution time in AlarmService.currentTimeMillis() and AlarmService.addAlarm(org.cougaar.core.agent.service.alarm.Alarm).
LoggingService
          This Service provides a generic logging API.
ServletService
          This service can be used to register a Servlet for all HTTP requests that match a specified String path.
UIDService
          This service provides UIDs, which are globally unique object identifiers.

          The interface to be implemented by listener objects for this service.

          This service provides access to the file system by searching the configuration path.

          An interface used by the DataProtectionService.

          Implementations of this interface contain a secret key used to encrypt/decrypt persisted data.

          An optional DemoControlService.setSocietyTime(long,double,long,Set,DemoControlService.Callback) progress monitor supplied by the service user.

          The interface to be implemented by listeners to this service.

PlaybookReadService.Listener
           
QuiescenceReportService
          This service is used by components to tell the node the initial quiescence numbering and to toggle between quiescence and non-quiescence.
UIDServer
          This service is the backwards-compatible API for the UIDService.
